original_text: Therefore shalt thou serve thine enemies which the Lord shall send against thee, in hunger, and in thirst, and in nakedness, and in want of all things: and he shall put a yoke of iron upon thy neck, until he have destroyed thee.
korean_text: 네가 주리고 목마르고 헐벗고 모든 것이 부족한 중에서 여호와께서 보내사 너를 치게 하실 적군을 섬기게 될 것이니 그가 철 멍에를 네 목에 메워 마침내 너를 멸할 것이라

sentences.original_text: Therefore shalt thou serve thine enemies
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 너는 네 원수들을 섬길 것이며

sentences.original_text: which the Lord shall send against thee
and in want of all things
and he shall put a yoke of iron upon thy neck
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 네 목에 철 멍에를 씌우고
